QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct region, case when region=0 then 'Missing' when region=1 then 'North East' when region=2 then 'North West' when region=3 then 'Yorkshire & The Humber' when region=4 then 'East Midlands' when region=5 then 'West Midlands' when region=6 then 'East of England' when region=7 then 'South West' when region=8 then 'South Central' when region=9 then 'London' when region=10 then 'South East Coast' when region=11 then 'Northern Ireland' when region=12 then 'Scotland' when region=13 then 'Wales' end as LOCATION_SOURCE_VALUE from {sc}.practice where region is not null
